description: Lars Findsen and two members of staff are suspended after claims of rule-breaking in the agency.
title: Danish military intelligence head Lars Findsen suspended
title_page: Danish military intelligence head Lars Findsen suspended - BBC News
maintext: "The fact that the head of the Danish Military Intelligence Service is a willing participant in circumventing the agency tasked with holding his own intelligence service legally accountable is mind-blowing and must be deeply concerning to the minister."
